## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Coal Mining and Storage at Position (41.0, -82.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (41.0, -82.0)
- Stone Furnace at position (43.0, -82.0)
- Burner Inserter at position (40.5, -80.5) and (42.5, -80.5)
- Iron Chest at position (41.5, -80.5)
- Wooden Chest at position (41.5, -79.5)
- Additional Coal Storage at position (47.5, -80.5) and (49.5, -80.5)

### Iron Ore Mining and Processing at Position (-15.0, -50.0)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner Mining Drill at position (-15.0, -50.0)
- Stone Furnace at positions (-13.0, -48.0), (-11.0, -48.0), and (-9.0, -48.0)
- Burner Inserter at positions (-15.5, -48.5), (-14.5, -46.5), and (-14.5, -45.5)
- Iron Chest at positions (-16.5, -48.5), (-18.5, -48.5), and (-14.5, -47.5)
- Wooden Chest at positions (-14.5, -48.5) and (-9.5, -49.5)

## ERROR TIPS

### Errors when extracting from chests
- Ensure the player is close enough to the chest before attempting to extract items.

### Errors due to lack of resources
- Maintain a sufficient supply of iron ore in storage to ensure continuous operation of furnaces.
- Regularly check and replenish resources in storage to prevent interruptions in production.

### Errors when placing entities
- Verify that there is available space and the necessary items in inventory before attempting to place new storage chests or other entities.

### Errors due to undefined variables
- Ensure all variables are defined before use. Double-check variable names for typos or incorrect references.

### Errors due to full chests
- Regularly clear out chests that are full to prevent mining operations from halting. Consider setting up automated systems to manage inventory overflow.

### Errors in crafting due to missing items
- Confirm that all required materials are available in the inventory before attempting to craft items.
